document.full_text: a senate report, which had accused goldman sachs  of misleading clients and manipulating markets, was formally referred to the justice department and the securities and exchange commission (sec), which are reviewing its findings, bloomberg said.
document.title: justice department, sec probing senate findings on goldman
lines_and_colors: a senate report, which had accused goldman sachs  of misleading clients and manipulating markets, was formally referred to the justice department and the securities and exchange commission (sec), which are reviewing its findings, bloomberg said.
